MAP.COMMENT: Use variable substitution to transfer PO106, 850PO1TXI, and 850PO1SCH from the properties file to the pipeline

SEQUENCE.COMMENT: Otherwise, map FOB segment under PO1
If ShipMethodCode is not null, map TD5 segment
If Note is not empty, map LineItem/Note to PO1/MSG segment

BRANCH.COMMENT: Check PO106 from the properties file

MAP.COMMENT: If PO106 is not null, map PO106 from the properties file and PO107 from SupplierCatNum.

BRANCH.COMMENT: Check the properties file to see if need to map PO1/TXI
Check the properties file to see if need to map PO1/SCH

MAP.NAME: $null
MAP.COMMENT: If POTotal is null, clean up pipeline

MAP.NAME: $default
MAP.COMMENT: Otherwise, map AMT segment under CTT
